mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EGRESS_INFO( egress_id, epidemic_id, relation, egress_name, egress_sex, egress_age, is_egress, temperature, health_condition, train_flight, egress_time, egress_mode, egress_place, return_time, return_mode, return_place, remark, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{egressId}, #{epidemicId}, #{relation}, #{egressName}, #{egressSex}, #{egressAge}, #{isEgress}, #{temperature}, #{healthCondition}, #{trainFlight}, #{egressTime}, #{egressMode}, #{egressPlace}, #{returnTime}, #{returnMode}, #{returnPlace}, #{remark}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{updateDate}, #{createUser}, '0' )
